alert.note: Alert for NW Blount; North Sevier; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 1:59PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN SEVIER COUNTY THROUGH 330 PM EDT... At 258 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pigeon Forge, or 7 miles northwest of Gatlinburg, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Sevierville, Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Wears Valley, Roundtop Mountain State Park, and Great Smoky Mountains National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: NW Blount; North Sevier; Sevier Smoky Mountains
